response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, but we believe its true potential lies in the hands of someone who appreciates it fully. We are offering this masterpiece to you for a special consideration price of $1,200,000. This is an opportunity to own a piece that could be worth $1,500,000 to you, while securing a significant discount. We trust that you will find the value proposition compelling and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
